page.title: 05ARTS/CRAFTS
page.content: The Dove Centre contains four craft workshops in which work self-employed craftsmen. The workshops are for Pottery, Musical Instruments, making hammered dulcimers, restoring furniture, Etching and Tapestry.The Centre also runs summer courses for the general public to learn about these crafts. In Baltonsborough there is a Flute Maker and a Potter, and in Butleigh a Basket Maker. Many people here have hobbies involving different types of arts and crafts, some working commercially and others for their own pleasure.
